HOME_DELIVERY.pricing:
Doručení na adresu: 89 Kč (zdarma od 1799 Kč)
Balíkovna na adresu: 79 Kč (zdarma od 1799 Kč)
PPL – kurýr: 99 Kč (zdarma od 1799 Kč)

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: 79 Kč. Zdarma pro objednávky od 1799 Kč.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: 79 Kč. Zdarma pro objednávky od 1799 Kč.

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: The store offers home delivery and delivery to parcel shops/lockers. Home delivery is handled by PPL and Česká pošta (Balíkovna na adresu), with an additional generic option where the carrier is selected by the store. Parcel shop/locker delivery is available through Zásilkovna, Balíkovna, and PPL. In-store pickup and specialized bulky item delivery are not offered. PRICING: Parcel shop delivery costs 79 Kč. Home delivery ranges from 79 Kč to 99 Kč depending on the carrier. All delivery methods are free for orders over 1799 Kč. A flat cash on delivery (COD) surcharge of 49 Kč applies to all applicable orders. NOTABLE FEATURES: A clear free shipping threshold at 1799 Kč is a key feature. The store also offers a generic home delivery option where they choose the most suitable carrier for the address. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented in a clear and simple table on a dedicated 'Doprava a platba' page, making it easy to understand the costs and free shipping limit. However, the information lacks details regarding delivery timeframes, express delivery options, and weekend delivery. It also does not explicitly distinguish between parcel shops and parcel lockers, grouping them under general pickup point services.
